explanation: [0-0] On a gray carpet sits a miniature black and red shoebox. There is a hand on the right side. In the upper left corner, there are bullet comments.

[0-9] At this moment, the person takes out a pack of desiccant. He opens the desiccant, takes out a grain, and places it on the shoebox. Then he takes out a purple remote control car and checks the distance. He then remotely controls the car to drift, and the rear of the car knocks the desiccant on the shoebox to the ground.
